topics.title: Describe an Animal You Like
topics.prompt: Talk about your favorite animal. Describe its appearance and why you like it.
topics.hint: 請用3到5句英文描述你喜歡的動物，包含外觀特徵與喜愛原因。
topics.sample: My favorite animal is the elephant. It has big ears and a long trunk. I like it because it is very strong and smart.

topics.title: Share a Time You Lost Something
topics.prompt: Describe a time when you lost something important. What was it and how did you feel?
topics.hint: 請敘述一次你丟失物品的經驗，說明物品是什麼與你的感受，大約4句。
topics.sample: Once, I lost my favorite watch. I looked everywhere but couldn't find it. I felt sad and worried because it was a gift.

topics.title: Talk About a Picture You Took
topics.prompt: Describe a picture you have taken. What is in the picture and why did you take it?
topics.hint: 說明你拍過的一張照片，包含照片中的內容與拍照原因，約3至5句。
topics.sample: I took a picture of a beautiful sunset at the beach. The sky was orange and pink. I took it because it was so peaceful.

topics.title: Imagine Meeting a Real Animal
topics.prompt: Imagine you meet a wild animal. Describe the animal and how you would react.
topics.hint: 想像遇見一隻野生動物，描述動物和你的反應，說明感受，約4句。
topics.sample: If I met a real giraffe, I would be very surprised. The giraffe is very tall with a long neck. I would stay calm and watch it quietly.

topics.title: Describe Where You Like to Visit
topics.prompt: Talk about a place you like to visit. Describe what you see and do there.
topics.hint: 描述你喜歡去的一個地方，說明那裡看到的事物與你通常做的活動，約5句。
topics.sample: I like to visit the zoo. There are many animals like monkeys and rhinos. I enjoy watching them and taking photos.

topics.title: Share Your Feelings About a Surprise
topics.prompt: Describe how you feel when something unexpected happens. Give an example.
topics.hint: 說明你遇到意外狀況時的感覺，並舉一個真實或想像的例子，約4句。
topics.sample: I feel shocked when I see something unexpected. For example, once a bird flew into my room. It made me nervous but curious.

topics.title: Tell a Short Animal Story
topics.prompt: Tell a short story about an animal. It can be real or imaginary.
topics.hint: 講一個關於動物的短故事，可以是真實或想像的內容，3-5句。
topics.sample: There was a small monkey who got lost in the forest. It looked for its family all day. Finally, it found them near a big tree.

topics.title: Describe the Sounds You Hear
topics.prompt: Describe some sounds you hear in nature. How do they make you feel?
topics.hint: 描述你在自然中聽到的聲音及這些聲音帶給你的感受，約4句。
topics.sample: I hear birds singing in the morning. Their songs make me feel happy and relaxed. Sometimes, I also hear the wind in the trees.

topics.title: Talk About a Funny Moment
topics.prompt: Describe a funny moment you experienced. Why was it funny?
topics.hint: 講述一個你經歷過的有趣時刻，並說明為何覺得好笑，約4句。
topics.sample: One time, I saw a dog trying to catch its tail. It looked so silly and made me laugh a lot.

topics.title: Imagine Being an Animal
topics.prompt: Imagine you are an animal for a day. What animal would you be and what would you do?
topics.hint: 想像自己變成一隻動物一天，說明你會是什麼動物以及你的活動，約4句。
topics.sample: I would be a dolphin because I love to swim. I would jump in the ocean and play with my friends all day.
